hero.title: ENGINEERING AT THE SERVICE OF INDUSTRY
hero.description: Through its various entities, the SOGAT Group leverages its expertise and innovative mindset to deliver high-performance, tailor-made industrial solutions.

hero.title: TOGETHER, WE GO FURTHER
hero.description: The SOGAT Group relies on specialized subsidiaries that combine their expertise to meet demanding industrial challenges. SP2I Ferroviaire secures train rooftop access, Aretec designs special machines, and SERMAS develops aluminum equipment alongside SP2I Pr√©hension, a heavy-load handling expert. Tracip Environnement manages industrial fume treatment, while Tracip M√©cano provides metal fabrication and machining of complex structures. Together, they deliver efficient, innovative solutions tailored to today's challenges.

references.title: OUR VALUES
references.solutions: Our engineering teams innovate daily and foster co-development with our clients.
references.project: Project management is essential at SOGAT and ensures effective collaboration with our clients.
references.results: For each project, we aim to achieve quality, cost, and timeline objectives.
references.services: Four companies working in synergy and a network of technical partners worldwide ensure reliable support throughout the lifecycle of our equipment.

metiers.title: Our Professions
metiers.description: We specialize in various professional domains, offering expertise across multiple sectors. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who bring years of experience and deep industry knowledge to every project.

sermas.title: SERMAS
sermas.description: SERMAS specializes in industrial automation and robotics solutions, providing cutting-edge technology for manufacturing processes.

sp2i-ferroviaire.title: SP2I Ferroviaire
sp2i-ferroviaire.description: SP2I Ferroviaire delivers specialized solutions for the railway industry, focusing on safety and efficiency in rail transport systems.

sp2i-prehension.title: SP2I Pr√©hension
sp2i-prehension.description: SP2I Pr√©hension develops advanced gripping and handling systems for industrial applications, optimizing production processes.

aretec.title: ARETEC
aretec.description: ARETEC provides technical expertise in industrial maintenance and engineering, ensuring optimal performance of industrial equipment.

tracip-mecano-soudure.title: TRACIP M√©cano-Soudure
tracip-mecano-soudure.description: TRACIP M√©cano-Soudure provides boilermaking and machining of complex structures with recognized expertise in industrial manufacturing.

tracip-environnement.title: TRACIP Environnement
tracip-environnement.description: TRACIP Environnement specializes in industrial fume treatment, offering innovative solutions for environmental protection.

haquette.title: HAQUETTE
haquette.description: HAQUETTE brings recognized expertise in custom industrial solutions, meeting the specific needs of each client.

groupe.title: PRESENTATION OF SOGAT GROUP
groupe.description: For over 30 years, we have been designing custom industrial solutions that help drive forward the largest players in the industry. A family-owned company with strong technological DNA, SOGAT combines innovation, expertise, and hands-on mastery to support its clients from design to production, all the way to on-site service. We operate across various sectors: railway, automotive, nuclear, steel, food industry, luxury, pharmaceutical, and environmental. Using cutting-edge technologies such as retractable catenaries, coil handling systems, punching, and aluminum cutting.

foundation.label: Year of creation of the first company (SOGAT = 1987)

departments.label: Specialized design offices in robotics, electrical, automation and mechanics

overview.title: SOGAT a family-owned, independent, historic and high-growth group
overview.subtitle: An economic model based on:
points: Portfolio of recurring key account customers, some of whom have been working with the group for over 30 years
Significant diversification of our clientele (Railway, automotive, nuclear, steel and aluminum, Food processing, Luxury, Pharmaceutical, Environment, etc.)
Recognized expertise and strong innovation capacity where we are leaders in France
Agile, flexible, experienced workforce with an average age of around 40 years

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: We specialize in various professional domains, offering expertise across multiple sectors. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who bring years of experience and deep industry knowledge to every project.

mechanical.title: Mechanical Design Office
mechanical.description: Our product studies are conducted with the utmost care, ensuring maximum integration of industrial manufacturing concepts and maintenance simplicity.
mechanical.detailedDescription: Our mechanical design office employs cutting-edge software and proven methodologies to create industrial solutions that are both innovative and practical. Each project benefits from our extensive experience in manufacturing processes and maintenance optimization.
mechanical.imageAlt: 3D mechanical design workspace with modern equipment
features: Advanced 3D modeling with CATIA V5 and SOLIDWORKS

electrical.title: Electrical & Industrial Automation
electrical.description: Complete electrical and automation solutions for industrial applications, from design to implementation.
points: Power Dimensioning and Electrical Diagram Development
Automation and Regulation (Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider)
electrical.detailedDescription: Our electrical engineering department specializes in industrial automation, combining traditional expertise with Industry 4.0 technologies. We design and implement sophisticated control systems that enhance productivity and reliability.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: High-precision manufacturing capabilities across multiple disciplines, ensuring quality and reliability.
manufacturing.detailedDescription: Our manufacturing facilities combine traditional craftsmanship with modern precision machinery. We handle everything from metalwork to complex assemblies, maintaining the highest quality standards throughout the production process.
manufacturing.imageAlt: Modern manufacturing facility with CNC machines

onsite.title: On-site Operations
onsite.description: Comprehensive on-site installation and setup services with certified professionals.
onsite.detailedDescription: Our field operations team handles complete industrial equipment installation and commissioning. With extensive experience in complex industrial environments, we ensure safe and efficient project execution.

service.title: After-sales Service
service.description: Our SOGAT service department ensures customer satisfaction throughout the entire lifecycle of our machines.
service.detailedDescription: The SOGAT service department provides worldwide support throughout your equipment's lifecycle. Our global network of technical specialists ensures reliable assistance and rapid response times for all your maintenance needs.
service.imageAlt: Technical support team providing maintenance service

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Whether you have a question about our services, projects, or anything else, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
